General.Name: Yunnan QuakeSafe Seismic Isolation Technologies Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells anti-seismic products and shock absorber products in China. The company offers building isolation rubber bearings, elastic skateboard bearings, energy-dissipating dampers, highway bridge bearings, anti-seismic support and hangers, nuclear power anti-seismic series products and services, and shock-absorbing (vibration) series products. The company was formerly known as Yunnan QuakeSafe Seismic Isolation Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. in June 2019. QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.
